overview:
Nathalie Auber has more than 20 years of financial management experience. She joined Sofinnova Ventures in 1997 as CFO, and became a Partner in 2007. She is responsible for the administrative aspects of all Sofinnova Venture funds. She is a Certified Public Accountant in California and an “Expert Comptable” (CPA equivalent) in France. She is a member of the Board of Directors of the French-American Chamber of Commerce in San Francisco.

She was Director of Internal Audit for a publicly traded company, Catellus Development Corp., for five years. Prior to that she had seven years of experience with Deloitte and Touche, both in Paris and in San Francisco.

She holds a Finance degree from the Ecole SupÃ©rieure de Commerce de Rouen in France.
